name: texas-longhorns
description: Texas Longhorns multi-sport MCP server prioritizing baseball, then football, basketball, and track & field data for Blaze Sports Intel.

tools.name: get_team_seasons
tools.description: Return Longhorns season summaries with baseball-first ordering and CDT citations.

sport.description: Optional sport filter. Defaults to all sports in baseball→football→basketball→track_field order.

team.description: Optional team override. Only "Texas Longhorns" is supported.

tools.name: get_season_schedule
tools.description: Return a season schedule for the requested Longhorns sport with CDT-formatted timestamps and citations.

sport.description: Sport to fetch. Soccer is explicitly rejected.

tools.name: get_game_box_score
tools.description: Return a structured box score for a given Longhorns game with CDT citations and cache metadata.

sport.description: Sport bucket for the game. Soccer and other sports are rejected.

gameId.description: Stable identifier for the game or meet.

program.description: Program discriminator for basketball/track if needed.

tools.name: get_player_career
tools.description: Return curated career information for a featured Longhorn with CDT citation trail and cache metadata.

sport.description: Optional sport hint to speed up lookups.

tools.name: get_rankings_context
tools.description: Return rankings and advanced context in baseball→football→basketball→track & field order.

tools.name: search_archive
tools.description: Search Blaze Sports Intel's vetted Texas Longhorns archive. Soccer queries are rejected by policy.

query.description: Search query. Queries referencing soccer will be rejected.

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

soccer.message: The Texas Longhorns MCP server does not cover soccer. Please choose baseball, football, basketball, or track & field.
